item.description:
A bunch of people have asked for a Karaoke night, and this joint has gotten pretty good reviews for its singing atmosphere. Maybe we can have some food and drink before hand and then start singing around 9.30?

Butterfly Restaurant / Koi Lounge..831 Farmington Ave, West Hartford, Ct..(860)236-2816


"The Saturday night karaoke sessions at this Hartford, Ct area bar are undoubtedly some of the most popular in the region. Butterfly is an elegant Chinese restaurant, with the Koi Lounge located in the rear. High- quality karaoke equipment here provides incredible audio quality. Many of the participants at Butterfly / Koi Lounge are regulars and are very enthusiastic about their performances. The crowd at this Hartford, Connecticut area bar is usually friendly and supportive of all karaoke performers. Sometimes, the crowd of karaoke participants is so large that the sessions run until closing time. Karaoke normally starts at 9:30 pm and there is no cover charge."

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Karaoke Night at the Koi Lounge, West Hartford
